name: Turbo rig?  vHJ.1
description: Just an Idea I threw together with the concept of getting a rig together faster than the  corp can build up. The 3 Deus x really help with Jinteki and HB. Everything else is for just dropping and running to pressure the corp. No extra access so you're stuck with one card but if you can run constantly it shouldn't matter. redundant programs for recursion with Larla and continuing to fuel FLCC while you have you rig. Clone chips to get back parasites or key breakers.

name: Exile and cie V2
description: My first deck, modified and much better. I think there is some things to do with exile. What do you think ?

name: You shall (not) pass
description:
The main idea is to flatline the runner: is it possible with HB?

The combo to do it is a rezzed Janus with an unrezzed zed behind. Sentinel Defense program can help it to. Then you can use all ice you want even if click passable because 2.0 version requires 2 clicks and a runner has only 4 clicks :)

All ICEs have a high strength with a little help from the identity.
Use oversight with Janus, Biodroid for Ichi 2.0, Heimdall or Wotan.
Low agenda density because is a slow deck.
Corporate troubleshooter to make the ice unbreakle at the right time.
Many ICEs in the deck, so if you score a beta test, you could use it.

Maybe a better economy could improve it, but don't know what to drop.
Any suggestions will be appreciated.

name: NOT FUN
description: A simple HB deck, that wins not matter what. Very boring to play against.

name: Kate Siphon Theory
description: I try to make a powerfull deck with a solution for every problem
